00120 #define HPSS_SSM "hpss_ssm"
00121 #define HPSS_KEYTAB "/krb5/hpssserver.keytab"

00123 #if defined( _USE_GHOSTFS )

00136 unsigned int cache_inode_fsal_hash_func( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef ) 
00137 {
00138   unsigned int h = 0 ;
00139   cache_inode_fsal_data_t * pfsdata = (cache_inode_fsal_data_t *)(buffclef->pdata) ;
00140     
00141   h = ( (unsigned int)pfsdata->cookie * p_hparam->alphabet_length  + (unsigned int)pfsdata->handle ) % p_hparam->index_size;
00142 #ifdef _DEBUG_HASHTABLE
00143   printf( "hash_func key: buff =(Handle=%p, Cookie=%d), value=%d\n", pfsdata->handle, pfsdata->cookie, h ) ;
00144 #endif
00145   return h;
00146 } /* cache_inode_fsal_hash_func */
00147 
00160 unsigned int cache_inode_fsal_rbt_func( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef ) 
00161 {
00162   /* A polynomial function too, but reversed, to avoid producing same value as decimal_simple_hash_func */
00163   unsigned int h = 0 ;
00164   cache_inode_fsal_data_t * pfsdata = (cache_inode_fsal_data_t *)(buffclef->pdata) ;
00165     
00166   h = (unsigned int)pfsdata->cookie  + (unsigned int)pfsdata->handle  ;
00167 
00168 #ifdef _DEBUG_HASHTABLE
00169   printf( "hash_func rbt: buff =(Handle=%p, Cookie=%d), value=%d\n", pfsdata->handle, pfsdata->cookie, h ) ;
00170 #endif
00171   return h;
00172 } /* cache_inode_fsal_rbt_func */
00173 #elif defined _USE_POSIX

00187 unsigned int cache_inode_fsal_hash_func( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef ) 
00188 {
00189   unsigned int h = 0 ;
00190   cache_inode_fsal_data_t * pfsdata = (cache_inode_fsal_data_t *)(buffclef->pdata) ;
00191     
00192   h = ( (unsigned int)pfsdata->cookie * p_hparam->alphabet_length  + (unsigned int)pfsdata->handle.id + (unsigned int)pfsdata->handle.ts ) % p_hparam->index_size;
00193 #ifdef _DEBUG_HASHTABLE
00194   printf( "hash_func key: buff =(Handle=%p, Cookie=%d), value=%d\n", pfsdata->handle, pfsdata->cookie, h ) ;
00195 #endif
00196   return h;
00197 } /* cache_inode_fsal_hash_func */
00198 
00211 unsigned int cache_inode_fsal_rbt_func( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef ) 
00212 {
00213   /* A polynomial function too, but reversed, to avoid producing same value as decimal_simple_hash_func */
00214   unsigned int h = 0 ;
00215   cache_inode_fsal_data_t * pfsdata = (cache_inode_fsal_data_t *)(buffclef->pdata) ;
00216     
00217   h = (unsigned int)pfsdata->cookie + (unsigned int)pfsdata->handle.id + (unsigned int)pfsdata->handle.ts ;
00218 
00219 #ifdef _DEBUG_HASHTABLE
00220   printf( "hash_func rbt: buff =(Handle=%p, Cookie=%d), value=%d\n", pfsdata->handle, pfsdata->cookie, h ) ;
00221 #endif
00222   return h;
00223 } /* cache_inode_fsal_rbt_func */
00224 
00225 #elif defined( _USE_HPSS_51 ) || defined( _USE_HPSS_62 )
00226 
00238 unsigned int cache_inode_fsal_hash_func( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef ) 
00239 {
00240   unsigned int h = 0 ;
00241   int i = 0 ;
00242   char buffer[128];
00243 
00244   cache_inode_fsal_data_t * pfsdata = (cache_inode_fsal_data_t *)(buffclef->pdata) ;
00245   
00246   h  = pfsdata->handle.ns_handle.Generation ;
00247   h += pfsdata->handle.ns_handle.Type * 16 ;
00248   h += pfsdata->handle.ns_handle.Flags * 24 ;
00249   h += low32m( pfsdata->handle.ns_handle.ObjId ) * 32 ;
00250   h += high32m( pfsdata->handle.ns_handle.ObjId ) * 64 ;
00251   h += high32m( pfsdata->handle.ns_handle.FileId ) * 96 ;
00252   h += high32m( pfsdata->handle.ns_handle.FileId ) * 128 ;
00253 
00254   h %= p_hparam->index_size ;
00255   
00256 #ifdef _DEBUG_CACHE_INODE
00257   snprintmem( buffer, 128, (caddr_t)&(pfsdata->handle), sizeof( fsal_handle_t ) );
00258   printf( "hash_func key: buff =(Handle=%s, Cookie=%d), value=%d\n", buffer, pfsdata->cookie, h ) ;
00259 #endif
00260   
00261   return h ;
00262 } /* cache_inode_fsal_hash_func */
00263 
00276 unsigned int cache_inode_fsal_rbt_func( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef ) 
00277 {
00278   unsigned int h = 0 ;
00279   int i = 0 ;
00280   char buffer[128] ;
00281   
00282   cache_inode_fsal_data_t * pfsdata = (cache_inode_fsal_data_t *)(buffclef->pdata) ;
00283 
00284   h  = high32m( pfsdata->handle.ns_handle.FileId ) ;
00285   h += high32m( pfsdata->handle.ns_handle.FileId ) * 32 ;
00286   h += low32m( pfsdata->handle.ns_handle.ObjId ) * 64 ;
00287   h += high32m( pfsdata->handle.ns_handle.ObjId ) * 96 ;
00288   h += pfsdata->handle.ns_handle.Flags * 112 ;
00289   h += pfsdata->handle.ns_handle.Type *128 + pfsdata->handle.ns_handle.Generation ;
00290   
00291   h %= 1000 ;
00292   
00293 #ifdef _DEBUG_CACHE_INODE
00294   snprintmem( buffer, 128, (caddr_t)&(pfsdata->handle), sizeof( fsal_handle_t ) );
00295   printf( "hash_func rbtval: buff =(Handle=%s, Cookie=%d), value=%d\n", buffer, pfsdata->cookie, h ) ;
00296 #endif
00297   
00298   return h ;
00299 } /* cache_inode_fsal_rbt_func */
00300 #endif
00301 
00302 
00303 int display_key( hash_buffer_t * pbuff, char * str )
00304 {
00305   cache_inode_fsal_data_t * pfsdata ;
00306   char buffer[128];
00307   
00308   pfsdata = (cache_inode_fsal_data_t *)pbuff->pdata ;
00309   
00310   snprintmem( buffer, 128, (caddr_t)&(pfsdata->handle), sizeof( fsal_handle_t ));
00311 
00312   return snprintf( str, HASHTABLE_DISPLAY_STRLEN, "(Handle=%s, Cookie=%d)", buffer, pfsdata->cookie ) ;
00313 }
00314 
00315 int display_not_implemented( hash_buffer_t * pbuff, char * str )
00316 {
00317   
00318   return snprintf( str, HASHTABLE_DISPLAY_STRLEN, "Print Not Implemented" ) ;
00319 }
00320 
00321 int display_value( hash_buffer_t * pbuff, char * str )
00322 {
00323   cache_entry_t * pentry ;
00324 
00325   pentry = (cache_entry_t *)pbuff->pdata ;
00326   
00327   return snprintf( str, HASHTABLE_DISPLAY_STRLEN, "(Type=%d, Address=%p)", pentry->internal_md.type, pentry ) ;
00328 }
